name: Rise of The Bard
description:
The classic rpg feel in a more dystopian chaotic world. The classic trope of a hero coming to the aide of a land tormented by an evil ruler expect with more *flare*. A chaotic game full of memery, its as if the band kid from high school had his own personal fantasy. 

Created in Rpg Maker

Started March 2020

Thank you to everyone that has made this project possible, it's been fun expanding the limits of what I thought was ever possible. 

I couldn't done it without the help of my friends and all of the wonderful resources I found 

along the way!- James 

Special acknowledgments to:

-Dr. David Servias, Thank you for being one of the best music professors we could've ever had and I'm glad you were able to hold such a big role in the game's story.
